name: Beglitched
description: Beglitched is a game about insecurity, in our computers and ourselves.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Good Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Good Storage: 150 MB available space
